lexUnit.name: explain.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make (something) clear by describing it in more detail.

sentence.text: These sections will be broken down and explained by the lecturer , and further understood in your reading .
Carver explained that he was expecting a friend in Australia to wire him $1,500 any day .
Papert explains that Reagan 's election in 1980 put paid to any hopes of obtaining public money to establish such a centre in the United states .
She smilingly explains that the scanner is a sort of lie-down X-ray and leads me to a narrow bed that slides inch by inch through what looks like a dry-cleaning machine .
Instead , Paul explained that he was dissatisfied with his life .
Once the trainer explained how it took time to bring the body up to peak fitness , she stopped trying to keep up and felt better for it .
It was difficult , she explained , but then she had to do it .
The reason for such a late session , Ashenden explained , was simple : Eddie Stratton .
` I can recognise the warning signs straight away -- I start to tremble and go into a cold sweat , " explains Philippa .
I prefer to be chic , not showy , " explained Joujou , ` I buy everything from Christian Dior , my favourite dressmaker .
The receiver may explain this harsh treatment by claiming that to go beyond meeting the minimum legal position would jeopardise his whole strategy .
Scientists explain the descending apple by talking about ` the law of gravity " .
Bush 's White House spokesman explained his belief in ` trying to provide opportunities for them ( the Chinese ) to improve our relationship " .
` I 'm afraid what he has to say will cause considerable distress , " she said , after explaining her reason for telephoning .
He began by explaining his mission for AEA and whether he saw that it had been accomplished .
He could hear the Doctor explaining the injuries to a policeman .
But then she reminded herself that Miguel had entrusted her with his secret , and there was no way she could even explain her unhappiness to anyone .
She explained her predicament to him in French , occasionally gesturing at the Renault behind her .
There will be two meetings at Prescot Comprehensive School next week to explain the choices to parents and the consequences of their ballot .
Just as important as expert advice was the new President 's ability to explain his policies to the American people in simple , homely terms .
Squaring her shoulders , she said tersely , ` I really do n't see why I should have to explain myself to you .
` Breakfast fires , " his uncle explained without lifting his head .
Let me explain about George and I think you 'll understand better .
I explained rapidly about the pillbox and sure enough we saw Cawthorne set out from the farmhouse , walking diagonally across the Paddock towards the fence .
Silkin explained in a press interview that he had refused to enforce the law against the postal workers ' trade union because he feared that the action would precipitate a postal strike .
Only three boys understood and I got them to explain in Arabic to the rest .
But the pattern of response that is observed is not easily explained in this way : with most patients there is a strong impression that the food itself is directly responsible for the symptoms .
Creggan had learnt by now not to talk of his past , or to try and explain about the Zoo he had escaped from .
The laibon 's father had explained to Fahfakhs that the family was ready to pay compensation , up to the full amount possible .
I explained to him about the boxing-match and the waterfall and he went up close and examined the glass minutely , different areas of it , taking his time .
You have explained to me over and over how this thing can be possible .
Maji explained to me about pilgrimages .
` And now , if we could get back to the point , I believe you were about to explain to me about this proposition of yours ? "
The excuse shall be made to the Chairman of the meeting , and by him explained to Members who shall decide whether or not guilty by voting aye or no .
He must learn how to explain to other people , who are not experts , the concepts which have become familiar to him .
I explained to Valerie and Keith that a relationship could be anything they cared to make it .
I seem to have lost my purse … ” she explained .
She points to the newcomer and explains , " I met this woman at the council housing department and she said I could stay with her . "
` Then how do you explain t he wad of twenty quid notes stuff - " Miller paused for a moment and softened his tone .
They explained they were brothers on a walking tour .
` He 's going to explain he never meant to kill Cousin Saul that night .
His assassination was predictable , although how the murderer passed by the android security guards had yet to be explained .
The defendant will have to explain his default and satisfy the court that he has a defence or counterclaim which ought to be heard .
Later , the doctor himself telephoned to explain what had happened .
Johnny Rogan himself is at a loss to explain what he has done to provoke the wrath of the former Smith , while Morrissey says that the book contains certain inaccuracies about his Mancunian past .
Please ring me and I will explain which numbers you should use .
If you explain your personal requirements they claim they can meet them .
` You have exactly two minutes to explain yourselves . "
